mapper.select: select product_kind, product_weight, product_size, product_price, case when product_sold_out = 'Y' then '품절' when product_sold_out = 'N' then '판매중' else '준비중' end as product_sold_out from tbl_product_info order by product_kind, product_weight desc, case when product_size like '특%' then 0 else cast(regexp_replace(product_size, '[^0-9]', '', 'g') as integer) end
select file_uuid, file_path, file_name from tbl_file
select seller_name, seller_phone, seller_account_bank, seller_account_number, seller_account_owner from tbl_seller

select notice_start_date, notice_end_date, notice_text, notice_type from tbl_notice where 1=1
and notice_start_date <= #{today}::date and notice_end_date >= #{today}::date
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_info(product_kind, product_weight, product_size, product_price, product_sold_out) values(#{productKind}, #{productWeight}, #{productSize}, #{productPrice}, #{productSoldOut})
insert into tbl_file(file_uuid, file_path, file_name) values(#{fileUuid}, #{filePath}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: update tbl_seller set seller_name = #{sellerName}, seller_phone = #{sellerPhone}, seller_account_bank = #{sellerAccountBank}, seller_account_number = #{sellerAccountNumber}, seller_account_owner = #{sellerAccountOwner}
update tbl_notice set notice_start_date = #{noticeStartDate}::date, notice_end_date = #{noticeEndDate}::date, notice_type = #{noticeType}, notice_text = #{noticeText}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_product_info where product_kind = #{productKind} and product_weight = #{productWeight} and product_size = #{productSize}
